short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: People's Skills or Products for sale or barter. Primarily B.C. Interior. ChromeApp by Dan Weatherbee

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our goal is to create local directories of people with specialized skills and home made/home grown products, in order to inform resident's of what is available close to where they live.

We believe in the benefits of "staying local" - building, strengthening, supporting local communities and utilizing everyone's Projects. Citizens who facilitate and support grassroot initiatives.

There is no charge to list your skills, talents or products. Its 100% Free to use.
